author: taylor
msg: removed jdbc properties since not needed as the unit tests still can't find jdbc drivers
ive solved this on my machine by putting the oracle jdbc driver in the jrt/lib/ext dir

author: taylor
msg: Had to convert all ints to longs

author: weaver
msg: - Moved certain api interfaces out of /components/* into /commons
allows the packaging of jar dependencies within a component container's jar
to be added   to that containers classloader
- preGoals for test jar:install now look for special properties "jar.bundle" and "component.only"
to correctly package component dependencies and to prevent JUnit tests from adding
components to the classpath while testing (component loading is handled by our specialized
- components project.xmls modified to support the new component implenetation.  This
also allowed me to clean-up alot of non-required dependencies from components.
